_sText:
This is my first map, but hopefully not last.
I used lot of time to this and also to learning mapping.

_______________________________________________

Special thanks to Absolute who helped me with my buggs and teached many thing for me. I teased him a lot with my stupid guestions =)

_______________________________________________

If u have improvement ideas or u know what i should to practice, please tell me and tell how or link tutorial.

_______________________________________________

Also if u find bugg or if theres missing material or something like that, i would like to know.
_______________________________________________

I hope u enjoy my map. Its pretty easy on mpbhops but nicely challenging without.

_______________________________________________

Map filesize is maybe a bit bigg but maybe cause map is large and there is music.

_______________________________________________



Now download and enjoy =)




note: map have strange bugg. Anything works on first round
